entry.title: 100 things to do
entry.content:
I was too caught up with the ideas of getting good grades and finding good jobs that I forgot to enjoy my life. Life isn’t always easy and isn’t supposed to be. So here are 100 things I want to do, not necessary “100 things to do before I die” cuz I don’t want to feel the obligation to do so. If I do try something in this list out, it has to be for the pure joy/experience that I want to have, not anything else.

Cheers :)

  1. Dance in the rain
  2. See Northern lights
  3. Go to Griffith Observatory
  4. Live in another country for at least 3 months and learn their language
  5. See the volcano
  6. Camp on top of a mountain to see stars
  7. Go skiing
  8. Visit Japan
  9. Eat that freaking expensive Kobe beef
  10. Visit Great Salt Lake
  11. Scuba diving
  12. Scream out loud on top of a mountain
  13. Make someone laugh to tear
  14. Visit South Africa
  15. Sleep in the forest
  16. Experience Spring, Summer, and Winter in 1 day
  17. Mauna Kea stargazing
  18. Let go of a floating lantern
  19. Climb the Grand Canyon
  20. Do a traveling video, upload it on youtube and get 1 thousand views haha
  21. Volunteer at an orphan
  22. Donate blood
  23. Try kayaking
  24. Let someone know how much they mean to you
  25. Perform an act without wanting something in return
  26. Give a hug to everyone you see in a day
  27. Be a mentor to someone
  28. Fly in a hot air balloon
  29. Get a drink for a stranger
  30. Witness a solar eclipse
  31. Knit a scarf
  32. Bake a cake for someone special
  33. Fold 1000 origami cranes and give them to someone special
  34. See Cherry blossom in Japan
  35. Meet someone you can only dream of meeting
  36. Go to Korean sauna
  37. Go to a concert
  38. Donate to charity
  39. Visit a European country
  40. Run a marathon
  41. Ride a zip line ride
  42. Whale watching
  43. Visit Machu Picchu
  44. Go to a drive-in cinema
  45. Learn to play the piano
  46. Go ice skating
  47. To be continued …
entry.summary: I was too caught up with the ideas of getting good grades and finding good jobs that I forgot to enjoy my life. Life isn’t always easy and isn’t supposed to be. So here are 100 things I want to do, not necessary “100 things to do before I die” cuz I don’t want to feel the obligation to do so. If I do try something in this list out, it has to be for the pure joy/experience that I want to have, not anything else.
